content:
You need to set the project ID in Cloud Shell first:

```bash
gcloud config set project palios-taey-dev
```

Then try creating the bucket again:

```bash
gsutil mb -l us-central1 gs://palios-taey-terraform-state
gsutil versioning set on gs://palios-taey-terraform-state
```

After this, update main.tf with the backend configuration and initialize Terraform.
